page.title: 12Ickford School fete.
page.content:
The school fete was a success but it was a pity the weather did not hold out until the end.There was country dancing,a gymnastics display and many other attractions and stalls including smash the crockery,tombola and white elephant.The raffle prizes were 1st prize a black and white portable television, 2nd prize a personal
stereo cassete player and 3rd prize one girls watch and one boys watch as separate prizes.Apart from the weather the fete was a great success.We raised almost Â£300.
By Erica Green.
